pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.baseAttackT: Amount of threat generated when an attack hits
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.enableTopTh: Displays a visual effect on the token with the most threat
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.decayEnable: Applies threat decay when the turn changes
pf2e-threat-tracker.Settings.decayFactor: Determine how quickly threat values converge towards the average each round. 0 forces all threats to equalize to the average, 1 applies decay only without additional convergence.
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.xFactor.hin: Horizontal offset of the threat panel (in pixels)
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.yFactor.hin: Vertical offset of the threat panel (in pixels)
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.baseHealThr: Base threat generated when healing an ally, added to the amount healed
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.tauntSucces: Additional threat generated by a successful taunt maneuver
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.tauntCritBo: Additional threat generated by a critical success on a taunt maneuver
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.traitThreat: Adjust base threat values by trait
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.enableThrea: Disable this to hide the floating threat table on the canvas
pf2e-threat-tracker.notifications.enable: Reloading scene is required to apply changes
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.topThreatEf: Visual Effect for Highest Threat (Requires Sequencer)
Path to the visual asset displayed on the token with the highest threat (JB2A recommended)
pf2e-threat-tracker.config.title: Traits Configuration
pf2e-threat-tracker.config.traits.label: Threat per Trait
